part.content: PART I : PRELIMINARY. Sec. 1 - 2.
PART II : OF THE REGISTRATION-ESTABLISHMENT. Sec. 3 - 16A.
PART III : OF REGISTRABLE DOCUMENTS. Sec. 17 - 22.
PART IV : OF THE TIME OF PRESENTATION. Sec. 23 - 27.
PART V : OF THE PLACE OF REGISTRATION. Sec. 28 - 31.
PART VI : OF PRESENTING DOCUMENTS FOR REGISTRATION. Sec. 32 - 35.
PART VII : OF ENFORCING THE APPEARANCE OF EXECUTANTS AND WITNESSES. Sec. 36 - 39.
PART VIII : OF PRESENTING WILLS AND AUTHORITIES - ADOPT. Sec. 40 - 41.
PART IX : OF THE DEPOSIT OF WILLS. Sec. 42 - 46.
PART X : OF THE EFFECTS OF REGISTRATION AND NON-REGISTRATION. Sec. 47 - 50.
PART XI : OF THE DUTIES AND POWERS OF REGISTERING OFFICERS. Sec. 51 - 70.
(A) As to the register-books and indexes. Sec. 51 - 57.
(B) As to the procedure on admitting to registration. Sec. 58 - 63.
(C) Special duties of Sub-Registrar. Sec. 64 - 65.
(D) Special duties of Registrar. Sec. 66 - 67.
(E) Of the controlling powers of Registrar and Inspector General. Sec. 68 - 70.
PART XII : OF REFUSAL TO REGISTER. Sec. 71 - 77.
PART XIII : OF THE FEES FOR REGISTRATION, SEARCHES AND COPIES. Sec. 78 - 80.
PART XIV : OF PENALTIES. Sec. 81 - 84.
PART XV : MISCELLANEOUS. Sec. 85 - 93.
Exemptions from Act. Sec. 90 - 92.
Repeals. Sec. 93.
